column4: Hi... has anyone done un upgrade from Heron -> Ibex, on a box with LILO+LVM ?
I'm a bit scared because past kernel upgrades have left my box unbootable.
And I can't use GRUB due to a BIOS bug
lilo ?
i have to use lilo here, grub can't boot without a partition.  liloworks fine.
Did you upgrade from Heron to Ibex?  It's just that, I suspect this combo is not well tested.
no i didn't upgrade.  but lilo should work reguardless of version
you can   sudo lilo   to test the configurateion.
Last time I did a kernel upgrade, that claimed to work but left my box totally f*cked.
one question, did it load the kernel and dump you into a busybox shell?   or did it just say Li LI LI Li Li Li .....
if busybox shell, then that's not a lilo problem. it would have done the same with grub, it's a misconfigured initramfs.img    if no kernel loaded. then it's a lilo problem.
It was definitely before the kernel loaded, can't remember if it was the infinite LILILIs.
That particular problem was due to the kernel size.
I don't think the same thing will happen again, but my point is... it does screw up without warning sometimes.
So I'd feel a lot more comfortable if someone said "Yes, I did this upgrade, it worked."
no.  that's still not a lilo problem.  the boot loader is not to blame for that.
I'm not concerned who's fault it is.
The effect is the same
the kernel packages warn you, that you have to manually run lilo     it's not an issue.  it's pebcak.
It wasn't failure to run LILO.
i've been using lilo for about 9 years now. and on about 12 boxen.    lilo works!     and i'll say no more.
